Name: Confirm following items comply with requirements:
Ensure when using a winch to install cables that the correct breakaway pin/fuse and swivel is utilised to ensure the maximum pulling tension is not exceeded.
Cable is in good condition and free from damage and defects
Cable has correct origin and destination
Cable Type, Number of Cores, Size and Configuration is as specified
Bending radius recommended by the cable manufacturer has been observed
Where manufacturer’s information is not available, the following minimum internal radii may be considered suitable
Unarmoured sheathed cables = 6 times the cable diameter
Armoured sheathed cables = 12 times the cable diameter
Cable is clear of heat sources
Cable is segregated from telecommunications cables by either a continuous barrier or separated by at least 50mm - AS/NZS 3000 Clause 3.9.8.4 (c).
Cable is secured and mechanically protected (where required).
Cable is marked with cable or circuit number
Correct cable identification (Cable Size/Cable Type) (Photo required)
Terminals properly tensioned as per manufactures specification:
